original_text: You live safely in beautiful houses that are made from Lebanon's cedar wood. But when I punish you, you will cry out with pain. You will feel pain like a woman who is having a baby.’ A message about King Jeconiah You live safely in beautiful houses
korean_text: 레바논에 살면서 백향목에 깃들이는 자여 여인이 해산하는 고통 같은 고통이 네게 임할 때에 너의 가련함이 얼마나 심하랴

sentences.original_text: You live safely in beautiful houses
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 아름다운 집에서 안전하게 살고 있다

sentences.original_text: that are made from Lebanon's cedar wood
you will cry out with pain
like a woman who is having a baby
You live safely in beautiful houses
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 아름다운 집에서 안전하게 살고 있다
